Articles.Content:
Tie-low.

I'm rather enjoying these "How do you pronounce X" threads. Rather insightful to different accents and cultures.

In the interest of preventing General Discussion from becoming Pronunciation Discussion, we are directing all pronunciation talk to the most general of the pronunciation threads here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129524](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129524)

Closed.
